overview_of_class:
A seminar course for graduate students featuring internal and external speakers, responsible conduct for research training, and career-related topics.

This is a zero-credit required course. All MS and PhD students are required to complete three offerings of BMD_ENG 512, typically take in the fall, winter, and spring. The fall session for this includes Responsible Conduct for Research Training, which is required for all BME graduate students.

Speakers from a variety of BME-related fields will discuss ongoing research.
name: Grad Research Seminar in Biomedical Engg
subject: BMD_ENG
